section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on January 31, 2021.*
section.heading: Certificate of assurance moratorium.
section.text: Notwithstanding the requirements of § 42-3502.21, no owner of a housing accommodation shall request a certificate of assurance for one year beginning on November 4, 2020, and the Mayor shall not issue a certificate of assurance for any request received for one year beginning on November 4, 2020.
